item.description:
Yvonne has graciously invited us to have our monthly meetup fiesta at her house in Rocky Hill. Her colleague, Kurt, will be the co-host for the meeting. Please come and share fun and conversation!

This is a potluck fiesta. Please bring some food or drinks for the buffet table.

Directions: from north
From I-91 south: Take the CT-99 N exit, EXIT 24, toward WETHERSFIELD.
go 0.3 mi, then Turn SLIGHT LEFT onto SILAS DEANE HWY/CT-99.
go 0.1 mi, then Turn LEFT onto TOWN LINE RD.
go 0.3 mi, Turn LEFT onto CHARTER RD.
go 0.3 mi, CHARTER RD becomes ORCHARD ST.
go 0.8 mi, Turn RIGHT onto FERN ST.
go 0.1 mi to 23 Fern St Rocky Hill, CT 06067-2014

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Hartford Spanish Language June Meetup
